string.text: Damn, my head hurts. I could really use an aspirin right now... That dream didn’t help either...
Goddamn it, This the last thing I need right now...
What if I try to use the teleports? Maybe one of them will lead me to Scavenger?
I need to inspect the basement Marcus talked about; maybe I’ll be able to find something interesting.
What was that? Was that thing real or was I hallucinating? I think I’m losing my mind...
An SOS, strange, do we have another “guest”? I should check it out.
Damn it, Marcus, Where have you gone off to?
Rest in peace, Sledgehammer.
Fucking hell... This anomaly is just full of surprises...
Is this really it? Are we finally free from this god forsaken place?
I should check the arch-anomaly later. Perhaps I could find some valuable artifacts there.
I hate that tunnel...
Fucking shit, my head feels like it’s about to explode.
Raccoon might be able to help complete the contract. I should go talk to him.
I just go pay Raccoon a visit. I think he can help me out with this mission.
Besides a bunch of unneeded personal notes, this notebook has some kind of coordinates written on it. I should check it out.
What the hell? Why am I in this cage?
Alright, let’s find this Lefty... Where would I go if I’d just killed my friend?
I should inspect the surroundings when I have the time.
Damn it, Lefty... Who could have done this? I should search the hanger; Perhaps the murderer left some kind of clue.
I need be careful, one wrong move and I'll fall off.
I gave you a chance to leave peaceful but you didn't listen... Now rot in here for all eternity.
Get out of my head!
You can't break me!
Damn it, This place is swarming with bloodsuckers... I need to stay quiet.
I'll avange Savage's death... I'll make that Creature pay!
I need to blow the enterance shut, so that creature won't follow me out.
Good bye, hermit.

During the afternoon, I and Hunter went on our way and after a few hours we were already at the bar. When we reached the Bar, it was already dark so Hunter suggested we get some rest and head out to cordon next thing in the morning. However this story hasn’t ended yet...

Instead of wake up in the bar, I find myself in the Stronglav’s lair. In front of me, I can see a panicked Marcus and with each moment my memories of the past slowly fade away. The Stronglav won’t let me go so easily, he is keeping me trapped inside some kind of time loop until I give in. But I won’t give up, one day I will find a way to kill this creature. I promise.

I don’t know what happened after my conversation with Marcus, but when I come to I find myself in the Stronglav’s lair. In front of me there’s a panicked Marcus and with each moment my memories of Digger station And the Outpost fade away. The stronglav won’t let me go so easily, he is keeping me trapped inside some kind of time loop. He needs me, or rather my body and he’s going keep me trapped until I give in. But I won’t give in and I will find to kill him. I promise.

Listen up, mosquito, take beast and head for the zombies. We need to kill them at all costs if not they will invade our base. You can spend the ammo you have left, beast supplied as with additional ones. I hope you both pull through.
Beast, can you hear me? I try to talk to the leader of the base, he should free you. Just don’t do anything stupid in the meantime. See you later.
Are you ready? good. Take the lead while I cover you.
That's it? Thank god. Check the bodies for anything useful.
